thread.title: BRIEF-Scorpio Bulkers Gets Commitment For Loan Facility Of Up To $12.75 Mln

title: BRIEF-Scorpio Bulkers Gets Commitment For Loan Facility Of Up To $12.75 Mln

organizations.name: brief-scorpio bulkers gets commitment for loan facility of u

text:
April 3, 2018 / 8:42 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Scorpio Bulkers Gets Commitment For Loan Facility Of Up To $12.75 Mln Reuters Staff 
April 3 (Reuters) - Scorpio Bulkers Inc: * ANNOUNCES A COMMITMENT FOR A NEW LOAN FACILITY 
* RECEIVED COMMITMENT FOR A LOAN FACILITY OF UP TO $12.75 MILLION FROM EUROPEAN FINANCIAL INSTITUTION 
* ‍LOAN FACILITY HAS FINAL MATURITY DATE OF 5 YEARS FROM DELIVERY AND BEARS INTEREST AT LIBOR PLUS MARGIN OF 2.40% PER ANNUM​ 
* RECEIVED COMMITMENT TO FINANCE KAMSARMAX BULK CARRIER TO DELIVERED FROM JIANGSU NEW YANGZIJIANG SHIPBUILDING LTD IN CHINA IN Q3 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
